overview: When Sex is on the Menu, There's Nothing Better Than My Family's Creampie Recipe. While teaching his stepdaughter, Jodi, the importance of safe sex, Evan discovers that the two of them are turned on by the same sexual fetish. Passions explode when Sabrina promises to give her stepfather something her mother refuses to. Madly in love with his stepdaughter, Rilynn, Alec recommends that the perfect way to break their relationship to her mother is by getting pregnant. Carter suggests that she and her father, Mark, experiment with cream pies when their steamy affair becomes a little too messy.
title: My Family's Creampie Recipe
